website_summaries.verdict: A helpful assortment of durable items you'll need when you bring a new puppy or dog into your home.
pros: Includes bowls that snap into place in a crate
Training pads to help housebreak your puppy
Crate liner pad helps keep puppy comfortable in their cage
Also comes in medium and small dog sizes
cons: The collar and leash are not as strong as many on the market, but still good for starting with a puppy

customer_reviews.title: The “bed” is a glorified pad, not comfortable for Fido
customer_reviews.text: Collar was too big for my dog to start, the “bed” is a joke not soft or comfortable at all no difference from the floor. Pads were ok if you want your dog to learn it’s ok to lee inside🤷‍♂️ Ummm. Yeah not really worth the price but the bowls are ok just can’t put them in the frame or take them out u less they are empty otherwise they throw the contents all over .... so yeah maybe not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Janot

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought five, only two had the crate beds inside! No option to return or report the issue! We used to buy these for all pups we produce but now we’re moving on to more reliable packages. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: CJ14559

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loved everything!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves the toys. The kennel attaching bowls are perfect since her kennel keeps her from stealing the dogs food and vice versa. The collars are cute and gender neutral. If it is possible to select boy or girl that would be awesome. I really enjoyed this box!
customer_reviews.author: Aja that signs

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I think this is basically a waste of money. The collar and leash (which are the only things I really used) are flimsy and will need to be replaced very soon. The two bowls are unnecessarily complicated. Just give me two bowls. I'm using my own. The little toy is cute, and the Kong toys are fine. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Mangene

customer_reviews.title: Better suited for older dogs
customer_reviews.text: This kit wasn’t really useful for my bernedoodle. The toys were too big for his mouth, as were the bowls. And he didn’t like the cookies because they were too big and hard to chew. Even the kong toy is too big. Ideal for bigger dogs not new puppies.
customer_reviews.author: BookReview1234

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Cheap leash and collar and the puppy Kong toys were so tiny. More for a cat. There were about 7 wee pads in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for new puppy owner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister as a gift for her new puppy. She loved it, and everything in here is perfect for your new pet. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley D.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good idea for a new family member gift
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so where is the one for kittens/cats??? :) Saying that because this is a GREAT gift for anyone adding a new rescued member to their family. You could even add a few items and put this in a cute dog bed or pillow/pad. Add a throw for the couch. So many ideas to help with the adjustment of a new fur-baby. Just think about what you got when you brought home that new addition. And, then had to run out to the big pet store for something you forgot. This is just the cutest and actually pretty practical gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tanzanite Gal

customer_reviews.title: Wow what an awesome gift this would make.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! So impressed with this kit! What a great surprise this would be for anyone you know receiving a new puppy. Midwest Homes for Pets seems to be a quality based company, only offering top of the line products for many companion pets and animals. I was very impressed with the catalog that was included in this kit. Comes all in a plain cardboard box so if gift giving you might want to find a different box to wrap it in or present it in. Introduced me to the Snap in type dishes for kennels, I haven't seen those before.
customer_reviews.author: PasoCreek

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but pricy
customer_reviews.text: This set has a lot to offer: a cute toy, a brush, a nice and sturdy leash and collar, a bed, bowls with holders that can be locked onto a cage, plus a few other things puppies would need. The bed is plush, yet on the thinnish side, but the bowls are high quality stainless steel. I do find the price rather high, but I don't know how much everything would be if it were purchased separately. Overall, a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: graveyardgremlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift set is just the thing too give with the puppy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter set to give as a gift when you are gifting a puppy. There are packs of treats and toys with some wee wee pads and a thin crate bed included. There are a couple of nice stainless steel bowls that have the attachments on them that would allow you to attach them to a crate. Simple collar and leash. The Kong and treats that are included are one of the most popular toy and reward treats that the dogs in our family have ever had. Everyone loves them and they are the perfect gift for a new addition.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter gift set
customer_reviews.text: My son just got a new, medium/large breed puppy (Pit mix) and this was a great gift for him. He really appreciated the quality items. The puppy loved the treats. The collar and leash were well-made. The bed is not very thick, but soft and so far hasn't been shredded. The toys have been a fun addition to play time. He especially likes the Kong treat hide toy. It was fun to open all the items as well. A great starter kit and gift.
customer_reviews.author: pebbles

customer_reviews.title: ... with balls so this little starter kit was a perfect addition to his toys
customer_reviews.text: My small dachshund chihuahua mix is obsessed with balls so this little starter kit was a perfect addition to his toys. He loves to chase the kongs with the provided snacks inside. He also loves to play tug of war with the bear! The puppy pads are perfect because I live in an apartment and my little guy doesn't like going out in the rain. This kit is perfect for any new puppy or small dog owner!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Shields

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit with essentials
customer_reviews.text: Nice puppy kit with essentials. We particularly liked the KONG and treats and the Kong pet brush. The bowls are nice and I like that they can attach to the side of a cage. The bed is thin but good for a first bed or to cushion a cage. The leash is super flimsy, I’m not sure I would trust it for long. The little squeaky toy by kong is cute and fun to play with. The only thing we didn’t need was the container of pee pads.
customer_reviews.author: Hunting Creek

customer_reviews.title: Super cute little puppy started kit
customer_reviews.text: Super cute little puppy started kit! Toy piddle pads, bowls, leash/collar, snacks, and toys. My puppy loved it! I'm not a huge fan of the 'bed' that is included, as I feel it's flimsy. The bowls are stainless steel, and come with mounts for kennels, but they are not compatible with our kennel.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Poff

customer_reviews.title: Lots included
customer_reviews.text: This would be a perfect gift for a new dog owner, but more seasoned dog owners would like it, too. There is quite an assortment in this kit from toys, to a bed, bowl, treats, paw wipes, and so much more.
customer_reviews.author: reg

customer_reviews.title: great value!
customer_reviews.text: Price it out piece by piece and youll see that the seemingly steep buy in price is very fair. Quality on the mat left something to be desired but it works for puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Paulie!

product_meta.title: Puppy Starter Kit | Top Brands for Your New Dog
product_meta.description: Size:Puppy Kit | Large Dog BreedThinking about the perfect gift for the new Pet Parent? Then stop browsing and look no further! This puppy kit includes all of the top selling brands and is a great welcome home gift for any new dog! MidWest Homes for Pets partnered with other top pet brands including KONG and Coastal Pet Supplies to offer our new puppy kits. Each kit includes: KONG: 1 Classic Kong toy & snacks, 1 Zoom Groom brush & 1 Wild Knot Bear toy | Coastal Pet Supplies: 1 leash & collar set | MidWest: 1 small pet bed, 1 7-pack of training pads & 2 Snappy Fit pet bowls. This Puppy Kit ships in 1 cost saving & convenient package so all your new puppy gear arrives at once! Each Puppy Kit is breed / size appropriate & are available in three different sizes; small, medium & large dog breed. We at MidWest Homes for Pets understand that your dog is a part of your family and that's why we ensure our Puppy Kits are manufactured with the highest quality control standards & include other top trusted brands in the pet industry. This Puppy Kit includes a 1-Year Manufacturer's . If you have any questions about our Puppy Kits our customer service department would be glad to help you. MidWest customer service can be contacted at: 1-800-428-8560, available 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM, Monday - Friday.
feature_bullets: Puppy Starter Kit for Large Dog Breeds, Kit includes: Kong Classic Toys & Treats | Coastal Dog Leash & Collar | MidWest Dog Bowls, Dog Bed & Training Pads
Puppy Starter Kits includes today's top brands & gear you will want for your new puppy all in 1 convenient & cost savings carton!
Puppy kit includes | KONG: Classic toy & treats, 1 Zoom Groom puppy brush, 1 Wild Knot Bear | Coastal: dog collar & leash set | MidWest: dog bed, 1 7-pack training pads & 2 dog bowls
Puppy kit is ideal for large dog breeds w/ an adult weight upto 90 pounds
Great gift idea for new pet parents | Puppy kits are a great gift for friends & a great welcome home package for dogs!
MidWest Quality Guarentee | Puppy Kits include a 1-Year Manufacturer's Warranty on all items
